short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the progress of your tasks from your browser homepage and improve your accountability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your daily productivity with strix, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to transform your new tab into a powerful task management hub. Never lose track of your goals again with this intuitive, locally-stored task tracking solution that turns productivity into a rewarding habit.

Key Features
• Instant Visibility: Your tasks appear every time you open a new browser tab, keeping your goals front and center
• Unlimited Task Creation: Add as many tasks as you need, with seamless tracking and completion management
• Streak Motivation: Mark tasks as completed and watch your daily productivity streak grow
• Local Data Storage: 100% privacy-focused with all data stored securely on your local browser
• Minimal, Clean Design: A distraction-free interface that keeps you focused on what matters most

This extension is perfect for:
• Professionals seeking structured daily goal tracking
• Students managing academic and personal tasks
• Freelancers and entrepreneurs monitoring project progress
• Anyone committed to building consistent productivity habits

Transform your browsing experience from a potential distraction zone to a productivity powerhouse. Download strix and start crushing your daily goals, one task at a time!
